Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: Genetic Heterogeneity of Diffuse Large B Cell Lymphoma
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: Genetic Heterogeneity of Diffuse Large B Cell Lymphoma
Configuration.Description: We sequenced exomes of 94 DLBCL tumors and cell lines. 34 of the tumors had paired normal tissue. Our work elucidates commonly occurring gene-coding mutations in DLBCL.

ParticipantSet.UseLimitation: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the Data Use Certification. Use of the dataset is limited to research purposes only. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
